text: Encyc is a free, short, widely useful encyclopedia written by volunteers using collaborative wiki software. Encyc gives another choice to other more popular encyclopedias. Encyc makes very readable articles that look good on smart phones. Encyc started in the year 2008. == Nature of the project == Encyc is a kinder, gentler wiki encyclopedia, where new articles are welcome. Encyc makes the internet a more diverse and interesting place. One big website can develop a common style, whereas many little ones bring unique viewpoints. ==References== *Common Knowledge?: An Ethnography of Wikipedia, by Dariusz Jemielniak. Stanford University Press. p53, 278. ISBN 0804791201, 9780804791205. May 14, 2014. *Genre Analysis of Online Encyclopedias: The Case of Wikipedia, by Anna Tereszkiewic. Wydawnictwo UJ. p241. ISBN 8323328137, 9788323328131. 2013. *Konidaris, Dimitrios N. "Social recommendations production at online e-learning platform using web 2.0 technologies." (2015). (translated from Κονιδάρης, Δημήτριος Ν. "Παραγωγή κοινωνικών συστάσεων σε διαδικτυακή πλατφόρμα ηλεκτρονικής μάθησης με χρήση τεχνολογιών web 2.0." (2015). using Google Translate.) ==Other websites== * Encyc:About * Comparison of wiki encyclopedias * Criticism of Encyc * Encyc - WikiApiary category:Websites Category:Wikis Category:Encyclopedias
